item.title: Google’s AI model just nailed the forecast for the strongest Atlantic storm this year
item.description: If they improve further, AI weather models may very well become the gold standard.

item.title: Gemini Deep Think learns math, wins gold medal at International Math Olympiad
item.description: DeepMind followed IMO rules to earn gold, unlike OpenAI.
